entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
